response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This product is worth $1,500,000 to you, and I am confident it will significantly contribute to your endeavors. My offer to you is to purchase this product for $1,200,000. This price reflects a strategic balance between ensuring a fair return on my investment and providing you with an attractive deal. I believe this offer presents an excellent chance for mutual benefit and growth. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further details or agree to this proposal.", "product_price": 1200000}
